Usps.Heading: Effective
Usps.Text:
Works on Azure, AWS, GCE.
Runs on Windows, Linux, and Mac OS.
Supports MongoDB, Cosmos, and DocumentDB.

Usps.Heading: Code-first, strongly typed models
Usps.Text:

Usps.Heading: Portal-like UI
Usps.Text:
The portal you know and love, blades and all.

Usps.Heading: Extensible
Usps.Text:
Easy to extend. Bring your own library.
We run on native ES6, without transpiling.

Usps.Heading: Open Source
Usps.Text: All of our code is available on Github, with packages on Nuget.
